metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Falafel  Ingredients: 1 can chickpeas 1 small nin 2 clves garlic 1/4 cup parsley 1 teaspn cumin 1 teaspn criander 1 teaspn salt 1/4 cup flur Oil fr frying  Instructins: Drain and rinse chickpeas. Blend chickpeas, diced nin, minced garlic, chpped parsley, cumin, criander, and salt in a fd prcessr. Add flur and mix until cmbined. Frm mixture intballs and fry in ht il until glden.

Baba Ganush  Ingredients: 2 eggplants 1/4 cup tahini 1/4 cup lemn juice 2 clves garlic 1/4 cup live il 1 teaspn salt  Instructins: Rast eggplants until sft, then peel and mash. Blend mashed eggplant, tahini, lemn juice, minced garlic, and salt in a fd prcessr. Slwly add live il while blending until smth. Serve with a drizzle f live il.

Hummus and Veggie Pita Ingredients: 1 whle wheat pita bread 1/2 cup hummus 1/2 cup cucumber, sliced 1/2 cup bell pepper, sliced 1/4 cup shredded carrts 1/4 cup baby spinach Instructins: Cut the pita bread in half tcreate pckets. Spread hummus inside each pcket. Fill with cucumber, bell pepper, carrts, and spinach.
